name: 450-Final Project
description:
Game description: We plan to build a side-scrolling platformer game. You can use a d/left right to move and use space to jump. When there are ladders, you can use w to climb the ladder. The player can use the left shift to dash. Also, the player can press ESC to find the whole menu and choose the level they wanna play. Press E to teleport to the next box. Press Q to start a conversation with the frog.

In this game, you will restart at your current level only if you have coins(points), or you will start at the first level again.
